item.title: CVE-2022-38073|2024-09-16T17:53:18.569Z -- awesome%20support%20team -- awesome%20support%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Authenticated (custom specific plugin role) Persistent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Awesome Support plugin <= 6.0.7 at WordPress.
